message.content:
cs.MM, cs.SD, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.LG

This paper deals with the design of multimedia scenarios, which involves the use of sound and other media elements. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also discusses the implementation of the proposed approach in Pure Data, which is a software for real-time audio and multimedia processing, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.SD (Sound). The paper also mentions the need to express temporal relations for micro and macro controls, which could fall under cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of formalism to describe multimedia scenarios, which could be related to cs.CL (Computation and Language) or cs.LG (Learning).
